mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT /*+ FIRST_ROWS */ * FROM ( SELECT APP_KEY, MAJOR_VERSION AS appMajorVersion, MINOR_VERSION AS appMinorVersion, BUILD_VERSION AS appBuildVersion, APP_TYPE AS appType, B2C_MAJOR_VERSION AS appB2CMajorVersion, B2C_MINOR_VERSION AS appB2CMinorVersion, B2C_BUILD_VERSION AS appB2CBuildVersion, STORE_URL AS storeUrl, CASE WHEN OS_CODE = 'iOS' THEN APP_ENV_FILE_NAME ELSE APP_FILE_NAME END appFilename FROM APP WHERE DEPLOY_TYPE IN ('REAL', #{DEPLOY_TYPE}) AND OS_CODE = #{OS_CODE} AND DISPLAY_TYPE IN ('ALL', #{DISPLAY_TYPE}) AND OS_VERSIONS LIKE '%,' || #{VERSION} || ',%' AND APP_KEY = #{APP_KEY} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_VERSION DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM < 2) APP LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT /*+ FIRST_ROWS */ * FROM ( SELECT APP_KEY, MAJOR_VERSION AS contentMajorVersion, MINOR_VERSION AS contentMinorVersion, FN_MAJOR_CONTENT_FILE_NAME(APP_KEY, MAJOR_VERSION) as contentMajorFilename, CASE WHEN VERSION_TYPE = 'MAJOR' THEN NULL ELSE CONTENT_FILE_NAME END contentMinorFilename FROM APP_CONTENT WHERE DEPLOY_TYPE IN ('REAL', #{DEPLOY_TYPE}) AND DISPLAY_TYPE IN ('ALL', #{DISPLAY_TYPE}) AND APP_KEY = #{APP_KEY} ORDER BY SORT_VERSION DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM < 2) CONTENT ON APP.APP_KEY = CONTENT.APP_KEY
